paper.title: Columbia Digital News System. An environment for briefing and search over multimedia information

author.org: Department of Computer Science, Columbia University, New York, NY, USA#TAB#

paper.venue: Proceedings of ADL '97 Forum on Research and Technology. Advances in Digital Libraries
paper.abstract: In this paper we describe an ongoing research project called the Columbia Digital News System. The goal of this project is to develop a suite of effective interoperable tools with which people can find relevant information (text, images, video, and structured documents) from distributed sources and track it over a period of time. Our initial focus is on the development of a system with which researchers, journalists, and students can keep track of current news events in specific areas.
